::Shadow Wing::

She stood there looking at him. "OK, you explain why your on this 
recon and I'll explain why I'm here." She stood there for a moment. 
She realized that her emotions were taking over again.  She sighed.
"I'm sorry. I shouldn't be yelling at you like that. I came out here 
to get away from the base.  Away from you." She looked at him with a 
blank expression.  She couldn't believe she said that.  But she did, 
and she couldn't take it back.
She turned her back to him.
